name: MQTT Infrastructure
body:
MQTT-Infrastructure
===================

### Target

Creating and collecting several tools (like server, client, gateways, complex event processors, taskmanagers, gatekeepers, wrappers) for a comfortable and common MQTT-Infrastucture. 

Creating of a standard API (Wrapper) for using MQTT in different programming language in a similar way. 

Comfortable integration of $SYS-Namespace for admin/client ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
